---
title: Two Water Balloons Popped With An Oxyacetylene Torch
image: https://img.youtube.com/vi/Y9kYm7rOQEs/hqdefault.jpg
categories: Fun high-speed
---

A striker is used to ignite an oxyacetylene torch, producing a concentrated flame. When this flame is directed at each water balloon, the intense heat causes the balloon to burst immediately.
